Text: This is one of the best introductions on general chemistry(In my opinion,Tro, Kotz and Linus Pauling are the remaining ones).

Thanks ,dynstab2.
As always ,I'm deeply indebted to you for great uploads!

dynstab2  Can you find these two books 1) Economics  19th ed  by  Paul Samuelson  & William Nordhaus    

AND 
 2) Economics  12th ed  Richard Lipsey , Alec Chrystal
